comments: The LinkedService uses System Assigned Managed Identity for authentication.

alerts.details: Cannot upgrade LinkedService 'LinkedService shghatgeazuresqlsamisource' because authentication with System Assigned Managed Identity or User Assigned Managed Identity is not supported.
